website_summaries.verdict: Home security options are evolving rapidly, but SimpliSafe is one of our current favorites. If you want a comprehensive, easy-to-use system that features live monitoring, you'll have a hard time finding a better option at a better price.
pros: For such a multifunctional system, SimpliSafe is incredibly easy to set up and use
Their contract-free packages are highly customizable and thoughtfully designed for better, smarter home security
cons: SimpliSafe packages don't include video cameras, and you won't be able to connect with locks, lights, or other home automation devices over Z-Wave, Zigbee, or any other wireless network
The devices also look a little dated

customer_reviews.title: Be informed. This is an important purchase.
customer_reviews.text: After I bought it I read that it was easily disabled by using a cheap cell phone scrambler you can get on ebay. I'm a radio engineer so I tested it. True. So don't publicize that you have it with a Simplisafe sign. Maybe use another vendors sign or generic if it is that important to tell everyone. Hide the transmitter & keypad from view so repair-people dont see what kind of alarm you have.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NO CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: The system seems to be good, unless there is a problem. The customer service is extremely poor, if it actually exists at all. I have problem with an entry sensor that has never been resolved because I can't contact anyone at customer service after trying for several weeks. There are numerous complaints on their website, and other sites. I will not be activating monitoring, nor will I continue to use this system.
customer_reviews.author: Willie

customer_reviews.title: Two of us spent 5 hours trying to install this ...
customer_reviews.text: Two of us spent 5 hours trying to install this. We called Simplisafe twice and held for 12-15 minutes each time without ever getting assistance. The Motion detector never worked. It was impossible to sync the base unit with the key chain remote . System was wildly unsuccessful. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is absolutely pathetic! I can't get anyone to call me back ...
customer_reviews.text: Customer service is absolutely pathetic! I can't get anyone to call me back to help me get the base station connected. I followed the instructions exactly, and even had a friend try, and no one can understand why it doesn't work. I call customer support and am put on hold for an hour and then I give up. I tried morning, afternoon, and evening and can't get through. I also emailed CS and the response didn't address my questions, they just reminded me to set up a test, which I can't do because the system is not connected. This is unacceptable. I can't even assess the product b/c can't get past step 1! Don't waste your money & time.
customer_reviews.author: Celine Maullin

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately the unit does not work as expected
customer_reviews.text: ‘High hopes for this but so far the system is inoperable. Setup went fine until attempting to communicate with monitoring service... turns out that the delivered unit doesn’t work with T-Mobile in my area. The service wait times for help: 30 to 50 minutes queue currently. So far issu is unresolved by Simplisafe and so the unit does not work - hence 1 star. If a solution is forthcoming, I will update further.
customer_reviews.author: Simon D. Collier

customer_reviews.title: It Works, I found out the hard way
customer_reviews.text: Well I can honestly say this works, although I recommend that you pair it up with some kind of camera system like dropcam (which is what I have). On Wednesday, Nov 25, 2015 my home was broken into by two intruders. I received an alert from my dropcam of motion activity. When I viewed the video I watched as two people kicked down the door and wandered through my home. Luckily the simplisafe alarm siren went off and it scared them off without them stealing anything. I got a call from simplisafe and they called the police.
customer_reviews.author: John W

customer_reviews.title: I feel so much safer now!!
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars for feeling safer! The only real issue we've had is the battery in the smoke detector failed within the first week of use. It's supposed to have a 5 year life. I will update if Simplisafe contacts us with a new battery. We have the monitoring as well, customer service in all departments I've dealt with are wonderful, quick & informed. Installation is a breeze, I highly recommend! Update: We were contacted by Simplisafe and informed the smoke detector must be correctly attached to the mount as it depresses a button. If it's not properly attached, it emits a beep that sounds like low battery. I still rate 5+ stars and great customer service!!
customer_reviews.author: J. stanley

customer_reviews.title: System failed to report back to monitoring station. Big waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this package for a home in Venice Ca. The base unit could not hook up to their cell system. Simplisafe sent out a new cell card. Still no reception. They sent out a completely new base unit. After a month and a half the system still does not work. I will try to return the complete system. Simplisafe did try many times to trouble shoot the system unsuccessfully. Customer service although not helpful did try. UPDATE: Do Not Be Patient. Amazon took the alarm system back but kept 20% $100.00 for an alarm system that never worked.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Simplisafe not what it appears!
customer_reviews.text: Seeking a highly rated home security alternative to contract companies. Ordered delivered timely and without issue. Product seemed somewhat dated, install was easy. Attempted to initiate services but after the system base failed to function properly and multiple to remedy with Simplisafe went unanswered, boxed up for return. Very disappointing customer service despite many positive reviews. If you are considering this company, good luck, but my advise would be to seek security services elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: its been good. But when you have police with there guns ...
customer_reviews.text: Keypad is on its 3 set of batteries in 3 mnts, using new alkalines. Other then that, its been good. But when you have police with there guns out running around your office because the keypad didn't take the key entry, you start to wonder why they did make it so you could not hardwire it to power.
customer_reviews.author: Sidewinder

customer_reviews.title: and they were happy to cancel my account and lose my business
customer_reviews.text: Two alarms goes off after the initial 3 days test/practice period, No call from customer service. called them to see whats up, they did NOT care, and they were happy to cancel my account and lose my business, I have switched to ADT. Three of the entry sensors and the smoke alarm batteries were dead right of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: False alerts and the security package monitoring service is useless. SimpliJunk :-(
customer_reviews.text: Initially worked well but occasional false alerts. SimpliSafe monitoring service allowed a change to only notify me and not emergency services (so I could avoid fines for false alarms). However, Simplisafe monitoring services, a key part of the security package, changed that policy and did not notify me of the change. Thus, the security package monitoring service is useless and the hardware can false alert.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: This is absolute garbage. The registration process halts and states that the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is absolute garbage. The registration process halts and states that the base serial number is not a valid serial number. The base will not connect with the central monitoring company, when attempting to utilize Online Command. Support has been worthless. The only part of the registration process that works efficiently is taking your credit card number. Do not buy this system!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable, RF interference if you have a smart home.
customer_reviews.text: Nope, Nope, Nope. I have had this system for about 2 years. mostly reliable for 1.5 years but now it has become difficult. RF interference with GDO and remote control awning every 3 days. I have to unplug base unit and remove batteries from two keypads to reset system. Keypads "stay" armed even though base unit states "alarm off". Technical customer service cannot be reached. I am researching other options for a more reliable system. I dont have the time to be working as technical support for this company, you probably don't either.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: SimpliSafe simply sucks
customer_reviews.text: I've had the service for 2 months, and have called tech support each time I've added a sensor. Hold times are 22 minutes average, and I have had to make at least three calls each time. I've spent in unreasonable about of time trying to SIMPLY install. Nothing SIMPLE about it. Update: Since April 15 I've had FOUR different base stations. In addition, the techs require you, the owner, to do assembly of sim cards. And I still have no system that works
customer_reviews.author: roxanne easterwood

customer_reviews.title: Worst Security System Ever - SimpliSafe
customer_reviews.text: This is was the worst! Even the customer service assistance was worthless. DO NOT RECOMMEND this product. I realize that it is supposed to “save” you money but I’d rather pay a little and have a reliable security system and one that doesn’t work properly and takes you FOREVER AND A DAY to try to connect and get it to work. Even after I was sent a new tower, this system would not work properly.
customer_reviews.author: Rosanna

customer_reviews.title: Simpli BAD INSTRUCTIONS-- REDEEMED THEMSELVES
customer_reviews.text: Was excited, got my system YEA! Installation was easy, however..entry sensors kept falling off walls, had to restick several times. Motion sensor directions say 4-5 ft off floor and shouldnt pick up anything less than 30lbs..LIES! Multiple triggers caused by my 10 lb cat. Tech support says put motion sensor higher..not what book says. ALSO..key Fob works when it wants to. Not happy with this system at all right now ×update7-31-2019× returned system for new one..new system base station would not Activate contacted Simplisafe they sent a replacement..2nd replacement couldnt remove battery cover and it wouldnt activate..they sent another..FINALLY after almost a month my system WORKS!! SIMPLISAFE. customer service has been awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Hellcat

customer_reviews.title: Beware - this version is not wifi compatible
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product if you need wi-fi. Amazon is selling a last-generation version of this product that is not wi-fi compatible. That's supposed to be one of the differentiators for Simplisafe. Very disappointed. I set up the whole system before discovering this.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Zack

customer_reviews.title: MAC users stay away!
customer_reviews.text: With Mac at least: 1.Buggy to install program 2.Buggy to run program 3. Buggy when saving new component 4. Buggy when trying to register for monitoring If youre an Apple Mac user, save your money. In fact, go online and foogle Simplisafe on Mac issues. Dont buy, very cheaply made components too, the usb/keychain wont even keep its battery cover on unless usb cover is on - very disappointed but I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Louie Dumont

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat it.
customer_reviews.text: I live in Albuquerque - burglaries everywhere. I was victimized in June and I decided to give a new security system a try. This system is a bit expensive, but worth every penny. I bought the siren and the loud noise will be enough to scare most burglars off. All sensors work as advertised and is easy to set up. Have had it operational for about a week and am working on getting this hooked up to a land line. The keypad interface is really easy to use. Recommend getting a few keychains extra for family members. Makes using this thing very easy.
customer_reviews.author: gt3man2

customer_reviews.title: Alarm goes off for no reason. Customer Service won't take it back or replace it.
customer_reviews.text: Our alarm went off 5 times (!!) during the night (and in the process left our little 4-year old traumatized) due to faulty equipment (less than 1 year old). Have spent (wasted rather) a lot of time with customer service to first return the item and lastly have it replaced, but no luck. PS. we bought ours directly from Simplisafe website but sharing also here since Amazon reviews are a powerful way to make others aware.
customer_reviews.author: Leandro Cordeiro

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This company has nothing but false advertising it IS NOT COMPATIBLE WITH ALEXA IT CAN NOT DISTINGUISH BETWEEN A DOG AND INTRUDER or even a robo vacuum
customer_reviews.author: chuck gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Simplisafe connection problem
customer_reviews.text: Well first my simplisafe was sent to the wrong address...then when I finally received it keypad wouldn't connect to the base tower.. I called simplisafe and they told me that they too can't connect to either the keypad or tower... simplisafe is sending a new keypad and tower...I'll have to wait til Thursday June 20th to see if the others work... I think from now on I'll order any extras for my system from simplisafe directly... there customer service was wonderful...
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Piton

customer_reviews.title: Great protection for our new construction
customer_reviews.text: We mainly got this because it is connected to our local police and can arm/disarm via phone. Everything works perfectly. We couldn't be more pleased. Testing period is 72 hours. We tested the alarm sound and it's loud enough. I also liked the feature of being able to set a 'fake' password if someone enters your home and asks you to disarm it. The 'fake' password key would silently alert the local police. You can also purchase other products such as a camera (I believe it's still in beta) and a glass breaking sensor.
customer_reviews.author: ORclimber

customer_reviews.title: AS ADVERTISED, GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: from JMD on March 21, 2018 EASY TO INSTALL. CUSTOMER SERVICE AWESOME BOUGHT THIS FOR THE NO CONTRACT AND SMALL MONTHLY FEE. IT WILL COST ME ABOUT 8 BUCKS PER MONTH AFTER HOMEOWNERS DISCOUNT. EASY TO INSTALL, BUT, DID HAVE AN ISSUE WITH ONE SENSOR, SOMETIMES IT WOULD CHIME WHEN OPENED, SOMETIMES IT WOULDN'T. CONTACTED AMAZON, WHO SAID CONTACT SELLER. SELLER SAID CONTACT SIMPLISAFE. I DID AND THEY EMAILED ME BACK AND SAID THEY WOULD SEND A REPLACEMENT OUT AND TO SEND THE OLD SENSOR BACK. CUSTOMER SERVICE WAS EXCELLENT. WILL REVIEW ONCE WE HAVE HAD THE SENSOR ONCE IT HAS BEEN UP FOR A COUPLE MONTHS
customer_reviews.author: JMD

customer_reviews.title: Mine will not install, and we're leaving for vacation ...
customer_reviews.text: Mine will not install, and we're leaving for vacation in 2 days. If you're being led to believe its a simple install, don't. Spent an hour on the phone with the to no avail. They need to do things at their end to delete this install, and complete a new install with the Verizon module (because the cell mod they use has no signal here.) Yada, yada, yada.
customer_reviews.author: Blitz

customer_reviews.title: Great Great Great service !
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit, after some scumbag broke into my house, installing it couldn't be simpler, place the parts where are you need them, pull the tape so the battery makes connection and the base unit automatically detects the sensor. As for the paid service, I splurged for the deluxe, within seconds it will send your phone and alert telling you which sensor was tripped or if the power went out, or anything else with the system. This is a Fantastic service!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jack Harshman

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and worse service
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Paid for premium monitoring and they didn't respond to the Any of the alarm trips.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Roche

customer_reviews.title: JUNK
customer_reviews.text: Base station would not power up, after many tries and locations. Keypad always read out of range, even when sitting on router. How can you trust security if it doesn't work!
customer_reviews.author: mrho

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product line, keeps breaking. Not keeping anyone safe. Definitely not simple.
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had the products for months and they keep sending replacements for defective components. We are yet to even get the base station up and running. Support is pretty bad. I would hate to see what happens when this breaks if it ever gets used. Complete junk.
customer_reviews.author: MikeK

customer_reviews.title: NO ALARM SIREN WITH THIS KIT
customer_reviews.text: NO ALARM SIREN WITH THIS KIT...worthless unless you like to her a mild chime as someone enters your home lol lol. Wouldn't call that security in any way shape or form. This is a rip off for the uninitiated buyer that is expecting a SECURITY system. Will be returning and ordering from somoine else.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: setup was very easy. Complaint
customer_reviews.text: System works as describe, setup was very easy. Complaint: If you choose to self monitor, there is a annoying blinking light on the base station along with a voice command when arming the system. The company have very poor customer service as they have not returned a call, email or post on forum. I have been waiting for two weeks for a response. Apparently(from reading on the forum) there is a download that they can send to stop the annoying issues, hopefully the company will respond!
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: If this is true. They can call it simple safe gate Maybe a rip-off
customer_reviews.text: Bought a starter set for $300. I find out this system can be hacked for as little as $ 50 dollars by anyone. Read Forbes interview with simple safe . Simple safe says a fix might be on the way. Does that mean the fix won’t work on existing units. And they say don’t use simple safe signs to ward off would be thieves, because that alerts them that they can use their hacking equipment. Don’t know what to rate it yet. Simple safe please get back to me.
customer_reviews.author: Son of the pig

customer_reviews.title: This is good when it works... would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is good when it works... Good: Installation was quick and easy Packaging was nice and instructions were straight forward. Motion sensors work when set. You just need to adjust it and put it in an area where it would benefit you. BAD: I always have a hard time arming the alarm from the app. Constantly saying "no access to base station" even though this is in a good spot where the cellular connection is strong from any carrier. Only reliable during the trial period. Once they suck you into the monthly fee, the service becomes very unstable. I would not recommend this and am looking into something more reliable.
customer_reviews.author: windnsea26

customer_reviews.title: Obsolete, insecure and incompatible
customer_reviews.text: Security vulnerabilities with how the pin is transmitted (unencrypted) over the air and no upgrade or patch path- incompatible with new system components and no discounts for upgrading. No reason or incentive for us to buy another SS system at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan and Kelly Walters

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money or your security with this company
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT GO with this company!! before you lay down hard earned cash call them and when the auto system comes up punch up EXISTING customer and then sit back and wait to see how long it takes for them to respond. This company is nothing but a scam a complete fake alarm company My system has gone down for the last time and I'm switching to another company. This company will not offer protection no matter who is claiming on the radio that they are.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Hicks

customer_reviews.title: motion sensors pick up 50 lbs. dog
customer_reviews.text: At first I loved it, easy to set up. and it worked, the service end is not expensive, but the whole point in this system is the motion sensor was not to see my dog, who moves like a snail. AND IT DID! So i cant use them. Then the unit started to report errors from entry sensors, I removed but had to get tech support to do it, they found sensors that I do not have, whats up with that!!! lastly the monitor service picked up on alarm setting off, they could not reach me or my secondary, they decided NOT to call police! This is NOT what you want your monitoring service to do ! ! !
customer_reviews.author: memyselfandi

customer_reviews.title: I keep getting the 'not connected to dispatch' message and ...
customer_reviews.text: I keep getting the 'not connected to dispatch' message and there is no customer service after 6pm. How the heck am I supposed to feel safe if I can't even troubleshoot a problem whenever I need to?!
customer_reviews.author: Author of Zaydo Potato Allah Loves Me

customer_reviews.title: Constantly says keypad out of range despite being in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Constantly says keypad out of range despite being in the same room. When armed away and disarming the base doesn't recognize and it keeps beeping untill the alarm sounds.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Very good (Yes, good) customer support.
customer_reviews.text: I have read a lot of negative reviews on support from SimpliSafe and can say my recent experience was very good. I had the common issue of not getting a good T-Mobile link after installation. I got an agent in about 8 minutes and she (Lourdes) spent about 40 minutes with me going through a number of resets and various troubleshooting steps. In the end, they determined I need a different wireless card (Verizon) and because I am leaving in two days, they overnighted the new circuit card. The agent was calm, efficient and helpful. Not an easy job, but well done.
customer_reviews.author: richard slater

customer_reviews.title: Great DIY alarm and Tools
customer_reviews.text: Great product for DIY that doesn't want to be stuck in a contract. This took me about 30 minutes to setup and test. The app is the most basic of basics. You can turn on and off the alarm, and text alerts get a bit annoying. The web tools are great for setting your own customization and personalizing to your needs. Overall you can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: A. Bag

customer_reviews.title: Door sensor opens don't always register. Simplisafe won't help ...
customer_reviews.text: Door sensor opens don't always register. Simplisafe won't help because it's out of its short warranty period. If you want to use it as alarm only as I do, it isn't worth it. Quite expensive for such outdated tech.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonaholic

customer_reviews.title: It's a great system.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great system and super easy to set up. Just about anyone could do it. It also works really well and the service is reasonably priced. I tested their calling response time 3 times during the first 3 days and they always responded within a minute. I've had more expensive systems and this one works every bit as well.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Sky

customer_reviews.title: Caveat emptor
customer_reviews.text: Pros - great response from monitoring service. When fully functional, he actual physical system is quite reliable and sensitive. Customer service seems to understand that there are inherent problems in the design and effectiveness of some components. The company is expedient in offering monthly service charge credits and replacement of defective equipment when something goes awry. Cons - SOMETHING will cease to work correctly and have to be replaced. During my 5 months of experience with the company, I have replaced at least 5 components. These include 2 Simplicams, a cellular module, base station, water sensor, key fob. Functionality can be very spotty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feeling Simpli Safe!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the Simpli Safe security system. Late one night we were awakened to the sound of our alarm, the Simplisafe monitoring station contacted us and we missed the call. They contacted us again to inform us the authorities were dispatched. The authorities did come to secure the premises . I feel very safe with this system.
customer_reviews.author: fateria johnson

customer_reviews.title: Beware this is the old, discontinued model.
customer_reviews.text: It works, it took a call to SimpliSafe to get them to reset the sim card. However: This is the old, discontinued, model. If you want all the new features like WiFi connectivity and light up keypad you'll want to buy the new one which doesn't seem to be available on Amazon. Only 2 stars for not disclosing an obsolete model. The other issue its the included software only works if you have Flash installed which no sane, security conscious, web user does. Even installing flash on a spare Mac it still refused to work.
customer_reviews.author: John P

customer_reviews.title: Good home protection.
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had decided to use this sooner. I was paying much more each month for Vivint. Once my contract was up 2 years I cancelled and installed this system. Easy to install, no wires, The other company gave me all kinds of trouble when I decided to quit. This can be installed in about an hour including motion sensor, smoke detector, glass break detector and a water alarm I installed next to the water heater and washing machine. Even has a keychain remote.
customer_reviews.author: Lee J Walker

customer_reviews.title: Beware: Obsolete product
customer_reviews.text: SimpliSafe has a dramatically updated product line as of 2018. Don’t make the mistake I did by ordering this previous gen Bravo model.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This security system is GREAT! I'm tired of always seeing commercials for other security systems that do the exact same this as this one but hold you to a contract for sometimes up to three years. This system does everything the expensive systems do but for much cheaper. The alarms work fine and the security team is very helpful
customer_reviews.author: JCNG

customer_reviews.title: Major flaws. Not loud siren. Extremely expensive add-ons
customer_reviews.text: Flaw #1. If the main base is accessible, the intruder can shut down the system pretty quickly. Also, the main base has no mounting options... meaning it is supposed to sit nicely at everyone's view. Flaw #2 the siren is not loud at all. Can barely hear across the house. To add a separate siren? $94! (are you serious?)
customer_reviews.author: Mojo

customer_reviews.title: Cost Effective and Easy
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to use. Bought on an Amazon deal of the day so price was especially good. Was paying ADT almost $60/month for so much less service and fewer options. I selected the highest cost package for monitoring and that is approximately $25/month. I don’t have the ability to install so hired someone who came recommended from neighbors. SimpliSafe provided extra yard and window signs at no cost.
customer_reviews.author: MaryH

customer_reviews.title: Great system, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Great system, easy to install. I accidentally triggers the alarm and the call center called me within seconds. We have used a different alarm/company for years and this is far superior.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie

customer_reviews.title: Junk equipment
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this is a piece of crap including the service. Now I'm stuck with this equipment that's by far the worst system I've ever had. There is nothing Superior about this at all
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod Earnheart

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to this system...now I'm not so happy. I set everything up with no issues and no system problems for the first 24hrs. I am now recieivng error messages for 2 censors. I have made all recommended adjustments with no success. I have attempted to call and email for assistance with no success. So, waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Too many pieces
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my home. However, after receiving the item it became evident that there was a better way to protect my home than by using all the parts of this product. So, I returned the item and ordered only the pieces I needed from Simplisafe directly. If you are a first time user, you really need to study the items available and select the ones that fit your need. A package may not be your best bet.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Huff

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: First one I received the base station lost it’s memory. Second one I received was missing parts
customer_reviews.author: Jon Deiler

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth the Price for the Peace-of-Mind
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the system. We recently lost a terrific Mastiff. We literally never locked our doors when we left the house because of her. Feeling a little more vulnerable now, although there's probably no reason for that. Don't like to leave the house unlocked any more, and do like the peace of mind this system affords. Easy to set-up, too.
customer_reviews.author: SoCalGuy

customer_reviews.title: Easy install.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install but I suggest using scews because the tape didn't stick very long. We decided to buy the system and would order the monitoring later. The base blinks constantly because we had not gotten the monitoring yet. That is annoying but after a few email's I was told how I can make it stop. This will cause a lengthy process once we decide to get the monitoring. So we deal with the blinking blue light for now. My order was missing the panic button.
customer_reviews.author: loretha knight johnson

customer_reviews.title: Horrible waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Horrible waste of money. Nothing but problems. Buy a wired security system. Our alarm does not work properly. 1. We get error saying “no link to disbatch” 2. Alarm does not go off when we open a door with alarm set to home. 3. Sometimes doors can be opened without setting the alarm off in home and away mode. 4. Sometimes keypad will not get signal from the base. Its only 20’ from the base. 5. Sometimes we enter the code 5-6 times before it will turn off the alarm.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Glad we sprang for this rather than a dog that might help them find our jewelry. Definitely signed up for the package where they monitor and make the call to first responders. Easy to put up. I opted to screw in as many of the sensors as I could and often used a little longer screws than those provided. Always tested to see if the sensor opens and closes easily over the heads of the screws I used before installing them. I have purchased enough sensors to cover ALL the windows (some pre-owned), a panic button, and a siren alarm for outside under the back eves.
customer_reviews.author: Drugdoc

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and setup. Simply Safe Company is outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived in time and in good condition. The installation and setup process was very easy. The company itself has been outstanding they have helped me with a couple of issues. I have accidentally set my alarm off a few times and they are call me almost instantly. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Janette Chasteen

customer_reviews.title: Easy and secure
customer_reviews.text: I did the insulation in 30 minutes or less. I saved a lot of money by canceling my old service. The camera keeps me informed at all times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great so far!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Have had security system for a month and 1/2. None of the pieces have come off the doors. Sticky substance seems to hold good. Voice of base is very soft. Can not hear in other rooms. Bought a VTech DM111 baby monitor on Amazon and this works great to bring sound closer to the rooms you are in.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Great for babysitting pets
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this system. I've had it in 3 apartments. And it's never failed me. Yes, this review is coming after a year and a half of the date of purchase. I would suggest this system to everyone. It's valued well. It's given me peace of mind. It's never broken down. And the monthly monitoring fee is not bad either. I love the fact that it works on wifi and a landline is not necessary. I can even talk to my pets if they are doing something they shouldn't be doing, thru the camera
customer_reviews.author: Dawn-Michele

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: If you know how this world operates and understand the gimmicks on how companies get us to pay more than please get this system but if you love big names and fancy gadgets then go with a big name security company. This works its purpose for us. No frills just want to know we're somewhat covered.
customer_reviews.author: NP

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up. Anyone with a 4th grade education can do it.
customer_reviews.text: I finally pulled out the components and installed them. The only drawback so far is the motion detector seems to be broken. It won't turn on, I swapped out the battery with the one from the glass breakage detector but the motion detector still doesn't work. I'll be contacting Simplisafe tomorrow, update to follow. Update, motion was working, I just wasn't testing it properly. My only fault is the 3M command adhesive won't hold long if installed on old varnish, use the screws provided, they worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Frustrated.
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't get set up. Call to service center was good, until I found out my area cell towers will not "speak" to homing device. They have to send out a device to switch out of base stand to speak to cell towers in area. Have to wait another three days to hook up. Reason I bought it was fact delivery and set up, so frustrated that I have to wait at least three days before system is in place. UUGGHH! Will give updated if and when I can get system set up and its working.
customer_reviews.author: AMY SCANLON

customer_reviews.title: If you do not have the service for ringing the police station I would recommend an outside horn and a camera in doors
customer_reviews.text: unit came with detailed instructions AND it did not take more than 30 minutes to install. If you do not have the service for ringing the police station I would recommend an outside horn and a camera in doors.
customer_reviews.author: jgsavage

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, works great. It says the motuon detector doesn't pick up animals under a certain size... it lies. Or it just doesn't anticipate couch climbing dogs... none the less, dogs now get locked away from the motion detector when we are gone.
customer_reviews.author: Cormac

customer_reviews.title: Don't. Just don't.
customer_reviews.text: After about a year, the problems started. Numerous issues with connection to dispatcher, alarm going off for no apparent reason, the base station oozing battery acid. They sent us a new base, which created even more problems. Absolute garbage.
customer_reviews.author: X

customer_reviews.title: Delay of 30 seconds with camera Have excellent wifi, no text or email with OUT monitoring ...
customer_reviews.text: Junk, complete JUNK Can't believe I bought this. Delay of 30 seconds with camera Have excellent wifi, no text or email with OUT monitoring service
customer_reviews.author: w brummett

customer_reviews.title: Great alarm. And easy to set up. Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. I used this on a vacant home I had. After one month I canceled and customer service was awesome. I was afraid I was going to have argue with them to cancel. During the month I used it I had poor signal and customer service sent me a VZ card for no extra charge. After that I was very happy with this stand alone alarm. It took me about 15 minutes to set it all up.
customer_reviews.author: Misty shiplet

customer_reviews.title: this works just fine. And we actually had to "use" it
customer_reviews.text: New to apartment living.... this works just fine. And we actually had to "use" it! The maintenance people came into the apartment while we were gone and I had the monitor people on the phone in less than 1 minute. Easy to use, you can set it with the remote (!) and on your phone (if you get the $25/month plan).
customer_reviews.author: Laura Centanni

customer_reviews.title: Can’t add additional components
customer_reviews.text: Needed additional pieces which we ordered from SimpliSafe. The new pieces were not compatible with the unit sold by amazon. Amazon’s unit was older and less expensive vs what is currently available. Had to send pieces back to make everything compatible. If all you need is the amazon set, you will be satisfied. The problem came with adding additional pieces....technology updated and incompatible.
customer_reviews.author: RJackson

customer_reviews.title: Newer model available
customer_reviews.text: There's a newer model with more features, but this will do for now. My police won't dispatch without a camera so you have to buy that in addition. It's definitely loud. They should give you little stickers to put inside the doors/windows...DONT OPEN UNTIL YOU TURN OFF SIREN. I'm just using post-its.
customer_reviews.author: Fool for Books

customer_reviews.title: Where's The Alarm?
customer_reviews.text: Did not get an alarm for the system. So apparently there is no way to drive the perpetrators off. Has panic button, but what use is it other than notifying the main dispatch. Need some sound to drive the perpetrators away or persuade them to not break in.
customer_reviews.author: Ron L

customer_reviews.title: Great concept but needs some tweaks!
customer_reviews.text: Great concept, but isn't as intuitive as some of the larger brands. The frequency of connectivity issues with the base station is to high. The online interface when you upgrade is lacking as well. For as long as this product has been on the market, they need to make a few tweaks to stay competitive! The only positive is that you are not in a contract. The install is also easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t ever hook them up
customer_reviews.text: Got two of these.. they never did work Because they were already registered to other people
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, expensive monitoring for basic options.
customer_reviews.text: I got this yesterday. It was easy to set up and get everything installed. I would give this a higher review except that you have to subscribe to the most expensive monitoring service to be able to control this from your phone. This seems like it should be a basic option which makes this a more expensive proposition. Also, it is not compatible with Alexis.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Aamot

customer_reviews.title: Locked Down
customer_reviews.text: This is so easy to install and works perfectly. Only pay month to month and can take this product with us whenever we move. Refuse to sign a 3 year contract with the main stream names that want to give you $10,000 worth of free equipment if you sign over your soul so this is perfect:)
customer_reviews.author: Roberto

customer_reviews.title: can make it better
customer_reviews.text: does exactly as seen in the videos.there are couple of things they can improve -the call center is open only during working hours 9-5, so if you want to change something or add something to your plan you should spend some of your working hours for it. -if you don't take the monthly monitoring plan, base keeps on announcing that you don't have connection to dispatch center,which is a bummer. -if the alarm is tripped, it announces entry sensor open but doesn't specify which one, in case of real emergencies it really doesn't help much. Thank god I didn't have to face that. But the monthly monitoring plan is cheaper than any other and the installation is very easy .
customer_reviews.author: H4C2012

customer_reviews.title: Great Inexpensive Security Option
customer_reviews.text: For $15 a month I have some needed security. I did have a little issue with placement of the main module. We live in a rural area and it was a bit difficult finding a place it would connect but I finally did and have had no problems since. I'm still using the original batteries and so far so good. I'm probably going to add-on some extra sensors for this is not bad. I don't have to pay $40 a month, I don't have to have a phone line, and so far it has worked flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Claiborne

customer_reviews.title: Great System. Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: After buying several home security systems that didnt work and returning i purchased the Simplisafe system and it works perfectly. Also very easy to install. It took me about 15mins. CONS: It does not work with the Simplisafe app. You have to purchase the dispatch service to use the app. Also the base flashes blue light constantly which can be annoying. My product also keeps saying one sensor is out. Followed the troubleshooting process but still wont connect the one sensor
customer_reviews.author: Johan Acher

customer_reviews.title: Very good, but some extra costs may be involved in your city
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and set up online. Check to see if your police dept. requires an alarm permit. Our city does and it cost me $25 to set up and $10 per year to renew. Not to difficult, but extra cost for a monitored system whether a Simplisafe or any other.
customer_reviews.author: kcurran

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product and terrible customer service. After two 2-hour phone calls and 2 separate base stations it still doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: MLM

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied Simplisafe Customer
customer_reviews.text: I rarely will write reviews but always read what others think before deciding in a purchase. I purchased the Simplisafe basic security system from amazon about 1 week ago. So far I am very satisfied. Extremely easy to understand easy to install and when I called with questions each call was answered quickly by someone who knew the answer and was ready to assist. I have subscribed to the basic monitoring service. I did order additional accessories directly from Simplisafe as amazons prices were not at all competitive. All communication with the company has been excellent I would highly recommend this system.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C. Valore

customer_reviews.title: Obsolete system
customer_reviews.text: While it seems to work, this is an obsolete system. It does not connect to WiFi. It does not support the newer sensors sold by SimpliSafe. This is not really made clear in the description. In fact, it is almost deceptive.
customer_reviews.author: TL6

customer_reviews.title: Good but Add Extra Siren
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Easy installation. I recommend getting the extra siren, especially if you have have multiple floors. Even at the loudest setting, with my upstairs room closed, can't really hear the alarm.
customer_reviews.author: K&B

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it’s worth it
customer_reviews.text: Unit arrived with siren box but no siren and no instructions
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Effective and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to protect my daughters apartment. We had minimal time for complicated setup. I researched what was out there and decided to give it a try. The product is amazingly simply to set up. The Mother Ship module sits on the mantle and recognizes each door or window unit as you remove the battery tab and activate it. You need to spend a few minutes on your computer selecting the monitoring package and the cell numbers you would like it to contact you on, but it is pretty simple. I did have 2 problems with 2 modules arriving with apparently dead batteries, so we need to swap those out.
customer_reviews.author: SEAN

customer_reviews.title: Simply not working
customer_reviews.text: The main pad does not connect to master station. SimplySafe offered to send a replacement, but only within the US, not Canada.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Affordabl, good system, easy to install, no contract
customer_reviews.text: This system is affordable and easy to install. I did have to call customer service more than once and they were very helpful and courteous. They did put me on hold once or twice while they were fixing the issue, but it was understandable.
customer_reviews.author: baird

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to install. Works flawlessly!
customer_reviews.text: It couldn't get any easier to install than this. Just plugged in the base unit. Mounted the keypad, siren, motion detectors, with screws and tape. We mounted the entry/window sensors with the sticky tape. The system works flawlessly!!! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Roy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to add devices to
customer_reviews.text: Very simple installation. Easy to add devices to. I'm not fond of the fact that you have to subscribe to their service to get all of the functionality. It connects to the wifi, but you can only control it via that app if you pay them. I would have easily given it five stars if they included that function with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: David W. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: tape not STICKING
customer_reviews.text: MAIN KEYPAD DOESN'T STICK TO WALL THE SAME WITH MOTION SENSOR SAME PROBLEM CALLED FOR HELP AND THEY SAID I WASN'T IN THE SYSTEM AND TOLD ME TO BUY TAPE AND THEY WOULD SEND MORE STICKERS HOW AM I GOING TO REVIEW AND TEST ITEM??
customer_reviews.author: RJR

customer_reviews.title: Good product sketchy customer service
customer_reviews.text: Customer is conveyor belt style. They need to "simplify" their verification process when clearing false alarms. Also the damn thing caused a few false activations from stuck keys!!@@@@
customer_reviews.author: Patrick E.

customer_reviews.title: Easy install security system
customer_reviews.text: This system only took me 30 minutes to install!!! And I love that you can add components as you need to along the way! Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this to anyone who needs a security system
customer_reviews.text: Easiest security system to install very reliable hands down the best I've ever seen and Superior customer service I've never seen anything like it
customer_reviews.author: Bill Counts

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with this product and the tech support for installation
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this product and the tech support for installation. Much better option in my opinion than expensive contracts. I needed help with setting up the system and the tech support was very helpful. I opted for the best monthly plan and really like the SMS and email alerts. I added glass break detectors and smoke alarms. These extras are actually cheaper to be ordered from the vendor's website.
customer_reviews.author: IntlPilot

customer_reviews.title: had the system for over a year. worked almost ...
customer_reviews.text: had the system for over a year. worked almost as advertised. it started giving me error messages that i was not connect to dispatch and key pad too far away. i had changed nothing in the year since activated it. my main complaint is that customer support is not existent. i wrote emails, called and waited for service for long periods, then left messages. the only response i finally received is when i said that i wanted to cancel my servicem almost immediately . because of that i did cancel.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney C.
